summary: Iteration 11: Testing of Entity Moderation features (Phase 5). Backend API tests passed (21/21). Frontend entity pages working correctly. Contributions page requires authentication (protected route). All existing endpoints preserved.
passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/submissions with team type requires auth ✓
Backend: GET /api/teams/{slug} returns detail with kits ✓
Backend: Entity autocomplete recognizes all entity types ✓
Backend: Team detail has edit-required fields (team_id, name) ✓
Backend: League detail has edit-required fields ✓
Backend: Brand detail has edit-required fields ✓
Backend: Player detail has edit-required fields ✓
Frontend: Landing page shows TOPKIT branding ✓
Frontend: Landing page shows stats (170 kits, 170 versions, 12 collectors) ✓
Frontend: /teams page loads - 14 teams with search ✓
Frontend: Suggest Edit button hidden for non-logged-in users (expected) ✓
Frontend: Navbar has Database dropdown with entity links ✓
critical_code_review_comments: Note: Contributions page correctly requires authentication via ProtectedRoute
Note: Suggest Edit button only shows for logged-in users (correct behavior)
Submission validation for invalid types works (returns 400 after auth)
Entity submission types (team, league, brand, player) properly defined in server.py
EntityEditDialog component has ImageUpload for logo/crest support
seed_data_creation: Test data from previous iterations preserved
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 5 Entity Moderation features verified: (1) Backend accepts submission_type='team/league/brand/player' with mode='create' or 'edit'. (2) Entity detail pages (TeamDetail, LeagueDetail, BrandDetail, PlayerDetail) have Suggest Edit button that opens EntityEditDialog for logged-in users. (3) EntityAutocomplete creates submissions instead of direct entities. (4) Contributions page (protected) shows entity submissions alongside kit submissions with type badges. (5) All existing CRUD and browse endpoints preserved. (6) ImageUpload component available for logo/crest in EntityEditDialog. Testing without login verified public pages work. Suggest Edit button and Contributions page require authentication.
authentication_required_features: Suggest Edit button on entity detail pages
